content: and 8 sts on needle two using needle three k the four sts on needle one you should now have 8 sts on each of the two remaining needles cut yarn leaving a tail of at least 12 long thread tapestry needle and graft toe closed using the kitchener stitch weave in ends kitchener stitch tutorial https //www purlsoho com/create/kitchener-stitch-video/ thank you for downloading my pattern i appreciate your support any comments or suggestions can be sent to yarncafecreations@gmail com and don t forget to check out my hand-dyed yarn here https //yarncafecreations com copyright 2019 yarn café creations christy houghton
